sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndiaryinfo ( SCHDUL_ID /* */ , DIARY_ID /* */ , DIARY_PROGRSRT /* */ , DIARY_NM /* */ , DRCT_MATTER /* */ , PARTCLR_MATTER /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #schdulId# /* */ , #diaryId# /* */ , #diaryProgrsrt# /* */ , #diaryNm# /* */ , #drctMatter# /* */ , #partclrMatter# /* */ , #atchFileId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndiaryinfo SET SCHDUL_ID=#schdulId# /* */ , DIARY_ID=#diaryId# /* */ , DIARY_PROGRSRT=#diaryProgrsrt# /* */ , DIARY_NM=#diaryNm# /* */ , DRCT_MATTER=#drctMatter# /* */ , PARTCLR_MATTER=#partclrMatter# /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE SCHDUL_ID=#schdulId# /* */ AND DIARY_ID=#diaryId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtndiaryinfo WHERE SCHDUL_ID=#schdulId# /* */ AND DIARY_ID=#diaryId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SCHDUL_ID /* */ , DIARY_ID /* */ , DIARY_PROGRSRT /* */ , DIARY_NM /* */ , DRCT_MATTER /* */ , PARTCLR_MATTER /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtndiaryinfo WHERE SCHDUL_ID=#schdulId# /* */ AND DIARY_ID=#diaryId# /* */

SELECT SCHDUL_ID /* */ , DIARY_ID /* */ , DIARY_PROGRSRT /* */ , DIARY_NM /* */ , DRCT_MATTER /* */ , PARTCLR_MATTER /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtndiaryinfo WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
DIARY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SCHDUL_ID DESC /* */ , DIARY_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndiaryinfo WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
DIARY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
